title: Legion
description: The final battle will soon be upon them. Who will win and who will lose? Legion is the seventh and final book in A.D. Starrling’s spellbinding urban fantasy series Legion, the spin-off of her bestselling supernatural thriller series Seventeen. If you like smart-mouthed heroes, angels, demons, myths, and monsters, then you’ll love this compulsive seventh installment in Legion.Suitable for fans of Jim Butcher, Ilona Andrews, Patricia Briggs, Christine Feehan, Shayne Silvers, Shannon Mayer, and K.F. Breene.
author: A.D. Starrling
